description: Surrogate primary key for the inventory record; uniquely identifies the row in sys_inventory.
Identifier of the most recent inventory transaction that affected this item/location; likely the last posted transaction number. Confirm with SME.
Indicator or reference linking this inventory record to a purchase order or invoice; meaning may vary by site. Confirm with SME.
Flag or value used to override the purchase order quantity when receiving or adjusting inventory for this item; confirm intended datatype and behavior with SME.
Indicator that locks the inventory record from certain transactions (e.g., issues, adjustments) to protect quantities/status; confirm exact rules with SME.
User ID or process that created the inventory record.
Timestamp when the inventory record was created (system create date/time).
User ID or process that last modified the inventory record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the inventory record.
Identifier of the print report or label template associated with this inventory item; used when printing item reports/labels.
